summary:
I am
- a translator English-Dutch and Dutch-English and owner of R&B Language Services. I'm specialised in
  creative  translations such as websites, advertisements, brochures, articles etc.
- a private teacher English and Dutch. I teach adults as well as children and at any level.
- a copywriter and a creative writer of web content, articles, news letters, manuals etc.

My core values are efficiency, high quality, openness and sincerity, all with a personal touch.
